participant_1.background:
My coworkers may think I'm a workaholic, but I'm just a pet lover who likes to have a lot of time for my furry friends.
i have been married eight years.
I like Drake's music, and my favorite color is blue.
I want a partner who is supportive and encouraging.
i am a very social person.

participant_2.background:
I do not play an instrument, but I love to sing along to country music with my fiancé on the weekends.
I watch Game of Thrones even though my parents don't approve of it.
I enjoy tinkering with my car, working on it in the garage and fixing it up.
my mother is a teacher in the city.
i am an animal rights activist.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing?
Doing well, thanks for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing well too. What are you up to today?
I'm just relaxing and watching some TV. What about you?
I'm actually in the middle of a work project. I'm a bit of a workaholic.
Oh, that sounds interesting. What kind of work do you do?
I'm a software engineer. I love my job.
That's cool! I'm a big fan of technology.
Me too! What are your hobbies?
I like to sing along to country music with my fiancé on the weekends. I also enjoy tinkering with my car, working on it in the garage and fixing it up.
That's really cool! I'm more of a homebody myself. I like to watch movies and read books.
I love to read too! What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially like historical fiction and mysteries.
I love mysteries too! What are some of your favorite mystery authors?
I love Agatha Christie and John Grisham.
They're both great! I also like Lee Child and James Patterson.
I've never read anything by James Patterson. I should check him out.
You should! He's a great author.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'm always looking for new books to read.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about books.
Me too! I'm glad we met.
Me too
